    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void draw()
      This method is called in the parent 3D PApplet and draws the content of the PApplet.
      void draw(PGraphics3D _g)
      This method is called in the parent 3D PApplet using PglueCapture(a virtual camera).
      void drawShape(PGraphics3D _g)
      This draws the content as a texture of a PShape
      PApplet getApplet()
      return the PApplet to show its content
      PImage getPImage()
      return the latest content as a PImage
      void post()
      This method is registered to the content PApplet, and called after draw() in the content PApplet to copy the drawn content.
      void rotate(float _rx, float _ry, float _rz)
      set the rotation of this display within the parent 3D PApplet.
      void size(int _dWidth, int _dHeight)
      set the size of this display within the parent 3D PApplet.
      void translate(float _x, float _y, float _z)
      set the location of this display within the parent 3D PApplet.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • PglueDisplay

        public PglueDisplay(float _dWidth,
                    float _dHeight,
                    ContentPApplet _contentApplet,
                    PApplet _parentApplet)
        Constructor
        パラメータ:
        _dWidth - width of this display
        _dHeight - height of this display
        _contentApplet - the content to show in this display
        _parentApplet - the 3D PApplet within this dispay is installed.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • post

        public void post()
        This method is registered to the content PApplet, and called after draw() in the content PApplet to copy the drawn content.

      • translate

        public void translate(float _x,
                      float _y,
                      float _z)
        set the location of this display within the parent 3D PApplet.
        パラメータ:
        _x - x of this display location
        _y - y of this display location
        _z - z of this display location

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float _rx,
                   float _ry,
                   float _rz)
        set the rotation of this display within the parent 3D PApplet.
        パラメータ:
        _x - x of this display location
        _y - y of this display location
        _z - z of this display location

      • size

        public void size(int _dWidth,
                 int _dHeight)
        set the size of this display within the parent 3D PApplet.
        パラメータ:
        _dWidth - width of this display location
        _dHeight - height of this display location

      • draw

        public void draw()
        This method is called in the parent 3D PApplet and draws the content of the PApplet.

      • draw

        public void draw(PGraphics3D _g)
        This method is called in the parent 3D PApplet using PglueCapture(a virtual camera). When using a virtual camera, the content should be drawn into a specified PGraphics3D.
        パラメータ:
        _g - a destination PGraphics3D to draw the content

      • drawShape

        public void drawShape(PGraphics3D _g)
        This draws the content as a texture of a PShape
        パラメータ:
        _g - destination PGraphics3D to draw the content

      • getPImage

        public PImage getPImage()
        return the latest content as a PImage
        戻り値:
        the latest content as a PImage

      • getApplet

        public PApplet getApplet()
        return the PApplet to show its content
        戻り値:
        the PApplet to show its content
